articles.title: India government says criminalising marital rape 'excessively harsh'
articles.description: The government has opposed petitions in the country's top court that seek criminalisation of marital rape.
articles.content:
The Supreme Court is hearing petitions seeking to amend a law that says a man cannot be prosecuted for rape within marriage
